attributes.action: Review the Representation of the People Act to ensure an MP keeps his promises if elected.
attributes.additional_details:
To ensure that our Politicians actually represent the will of the people and thus they be democratic. It has been too obvious recently that our "elected parliamentary Representatives" follow agendas and thus do not represent the majority of the electorate.
Politics is a discredited part of our society and exists to serve itself instead of the country. More accountability of serving members is required, plus the ability for any citizen to enter Parliament and not pre-selected inexperienced non-workers.
